get.description: Base endpoint to check if the API is running.
Handle incoming subscription request from clients.
Get subscription information.
Get subscription usage logs.

schema.title: Response Get Last Reached Subscriptions Api Stats Subscriptions Reacheds Get

get.description: Get a list of all nodes.

schema.title: Response Get Nodes Api Nodes Get

get.description: Get statistics about nodes.
Get a single node by ID.

schema.title: Response Delete Node Api Nodes  Node Id  Delete

get.description: Get a list of all services.

schema.title: Response Get Services Api Services Get

get.description: Get a single service by ID.

schema.title: Response Delete Service Api Services  Service Id  Delete

get.description: Get a list of all admins.

schema.title: Response Get Admins Api Admins Get

get.description: Get the current authenticated admin.
Get usage logs for the current admin.

post.description: Revoke API key for the current admin.
Rotate the current admin TOTP secret and return provisioning info for verification.
Verify pending TOTP secret and activate it.

get.description: Get a backup of the current admin and their subscriptions.
Get a single admin by Username.

schema.title: Response Delete Admin Api Admins  Username  Delete

get.description: Get usage logs for an admin by Username.

post.description: Revoke API key for an admin by Username.

get.description: Get subscriptions of an admin by Username.

schema.title: Response Get Admin Subscriptions Api Admins  Username  Subscriptions Get

delete.description: Delete subscriptions of an admin by Username.

schema.title: Response Delete Admin Subscriptions Api Admins  Username  Subscriptions Delete

post.description: Activate subscriptions of an admin by Username.

schema.title: Response Activate Admin Subscriptions Api Admins  Username  Subscriptions Activate Post

post.description: Deactivate subscriptions of an admin by Username.

schema.title: Response Deactivate Admin Subscriptions Api Admins  Username  Subscriptions Deactivate Post

get.description: Get a list of all subscriptions.

schema.title: Response Get Subscriptions Api Subscriptions Get
Response Create Subscription Api Subscriptions Post
Response Delete Subscriptions Api Subscriptions Delete

get.description: Get the count of subscriptions.

schema.title: Response Get Subscription Count Api Subscriptions Count Get

get.description: Get subscription statistics.
Get a single subscription by username.
Get usage logs for a subscription by username.

schema.title: Response Enable Subscriptions Api Subscriptions Enable Post
Response Disable Subscriptions Api Subscriptions Disable Post
Response Revoke Subscriptions Api Subscriptions Revoke Post
Response Reset Subscriptions Api Subscriptions Reset Post

post.description: Add a service to all subscriptions of the current admin.

schema.title: Response Bulk Add Service Api Subscriptions Services  Service Id  Post

delete.description: Remove a service from all subscriptions of the current admin.
